effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
